author: Matthew Impelli
title: More Than 2 Million People Have Been Diagnosed With Coronavirus Worldwide
description: More than two million people worldwide have now been diagnosed with the novel coronavirus, which causes the respiratory disease COVID-19.
content:
Worldwide cases of the novel coronavirus surpassed two million on Wednesday, the latest milestone in the ongoing global pandemic.
